function.name: brightness_setMin
function.description: This function is used to set the brightness of a smart home appliance or place to its minimum level.

location.description: The location where the device or place which needs to be adjusted is located.

room.description: The room where the device or place which needs to be adjusted is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to adjust the brightness.

groupAction.description: The group action to perform on multiple devices.
